INSERT INTO junse ( rent_grant_max_loan_limit_rate, qsc_tlno, int_sprt_cont, max_loan_limit_amount, rcmd_prod_nm, rcmd_grnt_prod_dvcd, grnt_prme_cont, req_trgt_cont, qsc_nm, grnt_dvcd, expt_grfe_rate_cont, user_id
) VALUES ( #{rentGrntMaxLoanLmtRate}, #{qscTlno}, #{intSprtCont}, #{maxLoanLmtAmt}, #{rcmdProdNm}, #{rcmdGrntProdDvcd}, #{grntPrmeCont}, #{reqTrgtCont}, #{qscNm}, #{grntDvcd}, #{exptGrfeRateCont}, #{id} )
